actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to establish a Federal Information Practices Board to review and report on fair information and privacy practices of governmental and nongovernmental entities.
short_title: Federal Information and Privacy Board Act of 1978

summary.text: Federal Information and Privacy Board Act of 1978 - Establishes the Federal Information Practice Board to conduct continuing oversight of the effect of private and governmental data collection activities on the rights and privileges of individuals. Directs the Board to investigate compliance with Federal laws affecting information practices, including laws pertaining to: (1) privacy; (2) freedom of information; (3) fair credit reporting and billing; and (4) government in the sunshine.

titles.title: Federal Information and Privacy Board Act of 1978
A bill to establish a Federal Information Practices Board to review and report on fair information and privacy practices of governmental and nongovernmental entities.
